page.title: 12CHILDREN'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: Here are some more ways in which children spend their time:- "In Bingham there are 3 playing fields. There are swings, climbing frames and tubes and football posts."(11 yr. old) "I like to got to the park and Ilike the swings and Ilike the climbing frame." (6 yr. old) "I like to go down the Linear Walk because it's like a countryside - it's quiet. It's like a zoo. There are ladybirds and rabbits and mice and grasshoppers." (7 yr. old) "In some of my leisure time I like to play football. On Saturday mornings and Sunday nights I go to the Swimming Club. I also watch a lot of television. My favourite programmes are adventures like 'Airwolf' but I also like some quiz games and comedy programmes." (13 yr. old)
